name: Remedy Music
body:
![](http://imgur.com/a/e8LVy)

# (774) 314-7355

Remedy Music buys, sells, & repairs musical instruments and audio equipment.
Based in Worcester we service Central MA, Boston, Metrowest & more.
Multiple locations available for pickup & drop off.


Please contact us for an appointment. 
Remote repair service and purchasing available.

## Services
#Repairs: $40/hr + Parts
Instruments, Amplifiers, Pro Audio Gear, and more.



###Guitar & Bass Services
Basic Restring: $20 + Strings
Deluxe Restring: $30  + Strings
          - Frets & Finish Polished
          - Fingerboard Cleaned & Oiled
Basic Setups: $30
          - Action & Intonation
Deluxe Setup: $40 + Strings
          - Includes Deluxe Restring



###Don't want it fixed? 
###We buy broken and used gear.
Contact us for an offer.

[Visit us on eBay for current stock!](http://www.ebay.com/usr/remedymusic)
